section.title: List Projects
section.para: The "Projects" screen displays information on all existing Projects. Using the search feature, you can quickly locate the Projects you're looking for. And with the right-click menu you can drill down into individual records to examine them more closely.
Here are some tips for using this screen:

listitem.para: Locate records quickly by entering portions of Project names or descriptions in the search window.
Look up Projects by CRM Account, using the CRM Account filter option.
The date range filter allows you to search for Projects within specified date ranges.
Select the "Show Complete" option to include completed Projects in your search results.

When viewing the Project list, you are presented with the following options:
Show Orders
You can select to include the following Project associations in the display:
Sales Orders
Work Orders
Purchase Orders
Incidents
Export View
Select to view all the Project Tasks in the format that will be used when exporting the Project Task list using the right-click menu. When exporting the display contents using this view, only the Project Tasks will be exported.
Show Complete
Select if you would like to include closed Projects in the view.

note.para: An expanded view for each Project is visible when you click on the arrow to the left of the Project.

section.para: To make a copy of a Project, select the "Copy Project" option from the right click invoked menu. The following screen will appear:
When copying a Project, you are presented with the following:

listitem.para: Enter a number for the new Project you want to create.
Enter a name for the new Project.
Enter the date when the new Project is due.
